description: Stay stylish and comfortable in the Men's Natural Provisions Graphic Short Sleeve Tee. Featuring a unique Smartwool® design and made with the odor resistance of Merino, and the durability of recycled polyester, you'll be dressed to chill lakeside, poolside, or anywhere in between.
name: Smartwool Natural Provisions Graphic SS Tee - Mens

specs.value: 56% Merino Wool, 44% Recycled Polyester. Exclusive of Decoration
